review: Works pretty well with everything except HBO GO. Watching HBO GO on this stick results in an extremely stuttery picture. It's like an extremely low framerate or something, looks terrible and almost makes you feel dizzy watching it.Until they can fix this and make HBO GO run correctly on the next version of this stick, it's probably not worth a buy.
author: DudeMon

review: Not only do I love the Amazon Fire TV Stick, I have convinced two more people this week that they needed one, too.  IMHO, if you have paid for an Amazon Prime membership and don't use a Fire TV or Fire Stick to view Amazon video content on your TV, you are leaving money on the table.  So easy to install, my 80 year old mother set up hers and installed apps with just a little phone support from her favorite personal technician (me, her daughter!).Sure, this model doesn't include the fabulous voice search on the remote, but just download the Fire TV app to your phone and then you do. Don't hesitate; it's the cost of a movie and popcorn for two in a theater.
